casebody.data:
Vivian GAGLIANO et al.
v.
ADVANCED SPECIALTY CARE, P.C., et al. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided October 11, 2016

Alinor C. Sterling, in support of the petition.

Michael G. Rigg, in opposition.

The plaintiffs' petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 167 Conn.App. 826, 145 A.3d 331 (2016), is granted, limited to the following issue:

"Did the Appellate Court correctly determine that the evidence admitted at trial was insufficient to support the jury's finding of actual agency thereby reversing the judgment against the defendant hospital?"
